name: Aliso Viejo
shortDescription: A master-planned community offering suburban comfort with parks, lakes, and vibrant shopping and dining options.
fullDescription: Located in southern Orange County, Aliso Viejo is known for its family-friendly atmosphere, well-maintained neighborhoods, and abundant outdoor amenities including trails, parks, and the scenic Aliso and Wood Canyons Wilderness Park. The city boasts top schools, thriving business hubs, and a variety of community events, making it an attractive choice for professionals and families alike.
heroImageAlt: A view of suburban neighborhoods with hills near Aliso Viejo

neighborhoods.name: Laguna Hills
neighborhoods.description: Neighboring city with established communities, golf courses, and shopping centers.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Residential streets and golf course in Laguna Hills

neighborhoods.name: Lake Forest
neighborhoods.description: Family-oriented city with numerous parks, lakes, and a vibrant community center.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Lake and park area in Lake Forest

neighborhoods.name: Mission Viejo
neighborhoods.description: Large suburban city with lakes, parks, shopping, and top-rated schools.

neighborhoods.name: Dana Point
neighborhoods.description: Coastal city known for beaches, marinas, and outdoor recreation.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Coastline and marina in Dana Point

highlights.title: Aliso and Wood Canyons Wilderness Park
highlights.description: Expansive natural park offering hiking, biking, and wildlife viewing in a scenic canyon environment.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Trail and wilderness area in Aliso and Wood Canyons

highlights.title: Aliso Viejo Town Center
highlights.description: Shopping, dining, and entertainment hub with family-friendly events and local businesses.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Shopping and dining area in Aliso Viejo Town Center

highlights.title: Community Events
highlights.description: Regular farmers markets, concerts, and seasonal festivals that foster a close-knit community spirit.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Community event with families and outdoor activities

highlights.title: Top-rated Schools
highlights.description: Excellent public and private schools serving the city, contributing to a strong family-oriented environment.

faqs.question: What outdoor activities are popular in Aliso Viejo?
faqs.answer: Hiking, biking, and nature walks in the Aliso and Wood Canyons Wilderness Park are very popular among residents.

faqs.question: How family-friendly is Aliso Viejo?
faqs.answer: The city offers numerous parks, quality schools, and community events that make it very welcoming for families.

faqs.question: What are the local shopping options?
faqs.answer: Aliso Viejo Town Center is the primary shopping and dining destination with a variety of retail stores and restaurants.

faqs.question: How is the commute to nearby employment centers?
faqs.answer: Aliso Viejo has easy access to major highways and is centrally located near Irvine, Laguna Hills, and Mission Viejo for work commutes.
